com.googlecode.gwtphonegap.client.geolocation
Interface Geolocation

Method Detail

getCurrentPosition

void getCurrentPosition(GeolocationCallback callback)
calculates the device's current position as a PositionJsImpl object. Function geolocation.getCurrentPositon is an asynchronous function. It returns the device's current position to the geolocationSuccess callback with a PositionJsImpl object as the parameter. If there is an error, the geolocationError callback is invoked with a PositionError object.

Supported Platforms

  • Android
  • BlackBerry
  • BlackBerry Widgets (OS 5.0 and higher)
  • iPhone

Parameters:
options -
callback -

watchPosition

GeolocationWatcher watchPosition(GeolocationOptions options,
                                 GeolocationCallback callback)
Watches for changes to the device's current position. Function geolocation.watchPosition is an asynchronous function. It returns the device's current position when a change in position has been detected. When the device has retrieved a new location, the geolocationSuccess callback is invoked with a PositionJsImpl object as the parameter. If there is an error, the geolocationError callback is invoked with a PositionError object.
  • Android
  • BlackBerry (OS 4.6)
  • BlackBerry Widgets (OS 5.0 and higher)
  • iPhone

Parameters:
options -
callback -
Returns:
a GeolocationWatcher that references the watch position interval. The GeolocationWatcher can be used with GeolocationMobileImpl.clearWatch(GeolocationWatcher) to stop watching for changes in position.

clearWatch

void clearWatch(GeolocationWatcher watcher)
top watching for changes to the device's location referenced by the GeolocationWatcher parameter.
  • Android
  • BlackBerry (OS 4.6)
  • BlackBerry Widgets (OS 5.0 and higher)
  • iPhone

Parameters:
